clubs.name: Manchester United
clubs.song:
Glory Glory Man United,
Glory Glory Man United,
Glory Glory Man United,
As the Reds go marching on, on, on!

clubs.name: Manchester City
clubs.song:
Blue Moon, you saw me standing alone,
Without a dream in my heart,
Without a love of my own.

clubs.name: Liverpool
clubs.song:
You'll Never Walk Alone,
 Walk on, walk on,
 With hope in your heart,
And you'll never walk alone.

clubs.name: Chelsea
clubs.song:
Blue is the colour, football is the game,
We're all together, and winning is our aim,
So cheer us on through the sun and rain,
Cause Chelsea, Chelsea is our name.

clubs.name: Arsenal
clubs.song:
And it's Arsenal,
Arsenal FC,
We're by far the greatest team,
The world has ever seen.

clubs.name: Tottenham Hotspur
clubs.song:
Oh, when the Spurs go marching in,
Oh, when the Spurs go marching in,
I wanna be in that number,
Oh, when the Spurs go marching in.

clubs.name: Leicester City
clubs.song:
When you're smiling, when you're smiling,
The whole world smiles with you,
When you're laughing, when you're laughing,
The sun comes shining through.

clubs.name: West Ham United
clubs.song:
I'm forever blowing bubbles,
Pretty bubbles in the air,
They fly so high, nearly reach the sky,
Then like my dreams, they fade and die.

clubs.name: Everton
clubs.song:
It's a grand old team to play for,
It's a grand old team to see,
And if you know your history,
It's enough to make your heart go, ohh!

clubs.name: Leeds United
clubs.song:
Marching on Together,
We're gonna see you win,
We are so proud,
We shout it out loud,
We love you, Leeds, Leeds, Leeds!

clubs.name: Aston Villa
clubs.song:
Holte Enders in the sky,
We'll keep the Villa flag flying high,
From the North Bank down to the Trinity,
We love you, Aston Villa, we do!

clubs.name: Newcastle United
clubs.song:
Oh, we're the famous Newcastle United,
And we're going to Wembley,
We'll be there, we'll be there,
We'll be there in our black and white,
We'll be there, we'll be there,
We'll be there in our black and white!
